text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَمَّنْ حَدَّثَهُ عَنْ إِبْرَاهِيمَ بْنِ مَهْزِيَارَ قَالَ كَتَبْتُ إِلَى أَبِي مُحَمَّدٍ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّ مَوْلَاكَ عَلِيَّ بْنَ مَهْزِيَارَ أَوْصَى أَنْ يُحَجَّ عَنْهُ مِنْ ضَيْعَةٍ صَيَّرَ رُبُعَهَا لَكَ فِي كُلِّ سَنَةٍ حَجَّةً إِلَى عِشْرِينَ دِينَاراً وَ أَنَّهُ قَدِ انْقَطَعَ طَرِيقُ الْبَصْرَةِ فَتَضَاعَفُ الْمَئُونَةُ عَلَى النَّاسِ فَلَيْسَ يَكْتَفُونَ بِعِشْرِينَ دِينَاراً وَ كَذَلِكَ أَوْصَى عِدَّةٌ مِنْ مَوَالِيكَ فِي حِجَجِهِمْ فَكَتَبَ يُجْعَلُ ثَلَاثُ حِجَجٍ حَجَّتَيْنِ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from the one who narrated it, from Ibrahim Bin Mahziyar who said,

‘I wrote to Abu Muhammad<sup>asws</sup> that, ‘The one in your<sup>asws</sup> Wilayah, Ali Bin Mahziyar, bequeathed that Hajj be performed on his behalf from a village, a quarter of it being for you<sup>asws</sup>, during every year, one Hajj, up to (expenditure of) twenty Dinars, and the road of Al-Basra is cut off, so the expenditure has increased upon the people, therefore it cannot be sufficed by twenty Dinars. And, a number of the ones in your<sup>asws</sup> Wilayah have bequeathed similarly with regards to their Hajj’. So he<sup>asws</sup> wrote: ‘So make (expenditure of) three Hajjs to be for two Hajjs, (and that would suffice) Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Willing’.

text: إِبْرَاهِيمُ قَالَ وَ كَتَبَ إِلَيْهِ عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ الْحُصَيْنِيُّ أَنَّ ابْنَ عَمِّي أَوْصَى أَنْ يُحَجَّ عَنْهُ بِخَمْسَةَ عَشَرَ دِينَاراً فِي كُلِّ سَنَةٍ فَلَيْسَ يَكْفِي فَمَا تَأْمُرُ فِي ذَلِكَ فَكَتَبَ يَجْعَلُ حَجَّتَيْنِ فِي حَجَّةٍ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَالِمٌ بِذَلِكَ .

en.hubeali: ‘And Ali Bin Muhammad Al-Husayni wrote to him<sup>asws</sup> that, ‘A cousin of mine bequeathed that Hajj be performed on his behalf with twenty five Dinars during every year, but it does not suffice, so what are your<sup>asws</sup> orders regarding that?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> wrote: ‘He should make (the expenditure of) two Hajjs to be regarding one Hajj (to be sufficient), Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Willing. He<sup>azwj</sup> is more Knowing with that’.
